text: Antanas Guoga (born 17 December 1973), more commonly known as Tony G, is a Lithuanian businessman, poker player, politician and philanthropist. In November 2020, Antanas was elected to the Seimas. During 2014â€“2019 he was a Member of the European Parliament for the Liberal Movement, and from 2016 for the European Peoples Party. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Business people Category:People from Kaunas Category:Poker players Category:MEPs for Lithuania Category:Philanthropists Category:Members of the Seimas
